title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: " There are twelve men in the w^ood below the Hill of Moonzie, there are six at Ballinbreich on the low road by the Tay, and six in the Pass of Dron.

title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: Again, by making a detour to the south, I might ride as far as Strathmiglo, and, turning then at right angles, reach Perth by the Pass of Dron.
